languages.text: "Прости, матушка. Я не пойду под ружья со всем свои кланом из-за твоего упрямства".
"Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."
languages.original_text: "Прости, матушка. Я не пойду под ружья со всем свои кланом из-за твоего упрямства".

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: “抱歉，老奶，我可不打算因为你的固执，把我和我整个氏族的人置于危险之中。”
languages.original_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: “抱歉，老奶，我可不打算因为你的固执，把我和我整个氏族的人置于危险之中。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «Lo siento, Yaya. No voy a arriesgar mi vida y la de todo mi clan por tu cabezonería».
languages.original_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, Yaya. No voy a arriesgar mi vida y la de todo mi clan por tu cabezonería».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「悪いな、婆さん。あんたの意固地さのせいで、俺と一族の命を危険にさらすわけにはいかねえんだ」
languages.original_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: 「悪いな、婆さん。あんたの意固地さのせいで、俺と一族の命を危険にさらすわけにはいかねえんだ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Tut mir leid, Alte Oma. Ich riskiere nicht wegen Eurer Sturheit mein Leben und das meines gesamten Clans."
languages.original_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: "Tut mir leid, Alte Oma. Ich riskiere nicht wegen Eurer Sturheit mein Leben und das meines gesamten Clans."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « Désolé, l'Ancêtre. Je refuse de risquer ma vie et celle de mon clan tout ça parce que tu es têtue comme une mule. »
languages.original_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: « Désolé, l'Ancêtre. Je refuse de risquer ma vie et celle de mon clan tout ça parce que tu es têtue comme une mule. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Kusura bakma Nine. Kendimin ve klanımın canını senin inadın uğruna tehlikeye atamam."
languages.original_text: "Sorry, Old Nan. I'm not putting my life and my whole clan's lives on the line because of your stubbornness."

traits.locale_text: "Kusura bakma ihtiyar. Kendimin ve klanımın canını senin inatçılığın için tehlikeye atamam."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong
